summary: This mod adds two optional eye packs for werewolf which gives more visible eyes during night and day (somekind of glow).
descriptionHtml:
THE EYES ARE MORE NOTICABLE IN GAME DUE TO LOW QUALITY OF SCREENSHOTS!
If you like...Endorse.
Original eye texture is from High Quality Eyes pack by Xenius.
This is modified Eye texture for werewolves that gives them visibility during night and more yellow tone,also added sharpness.

1.1 version:
I played around with textures and this is the best i could,if i added more glow effect eyes will be too bright and too yellow.So reffer to screenshots for 1.1 version.

Installation:
Extract to data folder and choose from two options:
Wolf Like Eyes - my favourite (refer to screenshots)
Yellowish Like Eyes- reffer to 1 example in screenshots

Unistall:
Delete what youve extracted.
author: Xahstur
